Legal_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness by visa officer
Application_Facts: Applicant provided employer letter and job duties description lacking details on responsibilities and remuneration
Defendant_Behavior: Visa officer did not contact applicant for clarification
Legal_Standard: No duty on visa officer to seek clarifications for ambiguous applications
Assessment_Factor: Sufficiency and clarity of submitted evidence
Procedural_Issue: Whether procedural fairness required officer to contact applicant
Evidence_Assessed: Lack of detail on responsibilities and remuneration
Governing_Rule: Onus is on applicant to provide clear and sufficient evidence
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Missing information on job responsibilities and salary
Harm_Assessment: Visa denial due to insufficient documentation
Cause_Description: Insufficient supporting documents in skilled worker visa application
Evidence_Handling: Officer assessed documents without seeking further clarification
Evidence_Issues: Incomplete documentation, lack of key details
Decision_Rationale: Applicant failed to meet burden of proof; no procedural unfairness
Evidentiary_Issues: Ambiguity and incompleteness in submitted employment documents
